Title: The Hustle
Writer: Stanley Shapiro (story by), Paul Henning (story by), Dale Launer (story by), Stanley Shapiro (screenplay by), Paul Henning (screenplay by), Dale Launer (screenplay by), Jac Schaeffer (screenplay by)
Actors: Timothy Simons, Rebel Wilson, Douggie McMeekin, Ashley McGuire
Plot: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.
Language: English, German, Dutch, Danish, French, American Sign Language
